content.detailedDescription: There was three different sightings one night and one more the next night. started off when i was at work.   went to get something from a building and noticed a bright light low to the ground and twinkling.  i observed it for about 6 minutes just watching it's lights grow very bright and dim to almost nothing. while watching the lights i could see it reflect off the clouds above it with a red light blinking in a while. i thought that was odd to see it reflect off the clouds.  well i did what i had to do in the building and proceeded back to my building to make something.  when i finished about 25 minutes later, i went to throw the boxes away in the dumpster. i headed in a east direction and still seen the lights hovering in the same area. i watched it again for a few minutes and was talking to it out loud and i made a hand eye gesture to let it know that i see it there. right after i did that the light moved towards me. i got a little nervous and moved behind the trash bin. well the object still was approaching, and it didn't take it long to get near me, as it started getting to where it was going to pass me overhead i moved closer to the building and looked up towards it.  i seen the bottom side of it had a single light on the back side about 8 to 10 feet apart it seemed. as it passed over head i kept thinking to look for the edge of it a shape, but i couldn't really tell.  i remember the lights very well.  it had 2 lights total on opposite ends and the lights and bottom of the object were completely flat and kind of a glassy slivery pearl color surrounding the lights and bottom side.  the lights were not hurting my eyes when i looked at them and they had like metal deflector inside each like that reminded me of a apple cutter, that cuts in 8 slices from a whole apple.  the lights were clear with a very light blue hue to them.  stationed in between the 2 lights just forward a little was a reddish brown amber looking circle that was flat as well.  this did not light up as it passed by and i didn't notice it from a distance either. the light that i seen coming towards me must have been on the top side of the object because i did not see it after it was above my head.  i was amazed that it cleared the top of the building i was by. a 5 story height without making any adjustments from the time it headed towards me.  all this happened i guess within 2 minutes time if that long. well after i didn't see it anymore i went inside and didn't say anything to my co workers. i kept thinking to myself was that real, is it motion sensored, what is it?  well i stayed inside the building working and pondering on what had happened but still did not tell anyone.  when i had to take a sample to the lab about 8 hours later, (9 pm roughly after this happened) i headed towards the lab facing in the westward direction, i could see the object in the field area. i stopped my cart and sat there looking at it again and talking out loud to myself.  i went in the lab and delivered my sample came outside and it was still there. so i sat and observed it for a few minutes and motioned with my hands pointing at it that i still see u like earlier.  after i did that it started moving towards me again from the west on to a east postion. well this really scared me and i took off in my cart and went back to my building and this time i told my coworker.  she said that maybe it was a drone. i told her at least 10 feet wide?  the public can only get like 17 inches wide.  i talked to her for about 15 minutes and decided to go to the south door and see if i could see it still and there it was.  so i called my coworker over who called her husband over and all three of us observed the flickering light just hovering  about i guess less than 1000 feet from the ground.  well now it's time to go home at 630 a.M. and i'm in my truck heading home and i believe it's the same object that i was observing as when i got to my house. so i hurried up and got my camera with a 600 mm lens and started snapping pictures. my son in law came out briefly and seen the light i was snapping pictures of.I took about 10 pictures and a short video although i didn't have it stationary so the light bounced around alot. went inside to go to bed and get ready for work when i wake up.  so now it's dec 25 at night and i'm off to work about 530 pm. i sit in my truck facing north in the parking lot and i notice a light again further away than yesterday night but was still in the east direction and heading towards the fairy crossing in galveston. i went inside and kept thinking is this aliens, a spy drone, a military drone and does my work know anything about this. i didn't see it anymore after that but i did get some good pictures. i have a video but its on my computer not on my phone i am doing this information on. that's it. just want to know is it alien?   it must not had intentions of hurting me cause it did interact by my motions and it came from me pointing at it.  also on the bottom side of this object i did not see any landing gear. the surface seemed very glossy and smooth underneath with nothing breaking the line of the smoothness. (the plane) completely flat like a counter top.  please respond back to me.
content.summary: Observed for a while, motioned to it 2 different times and it moved towards me.

content.detailedDescription: On dec. 27, 2014, between the hours of 11:00 a. m. -12:00 p.M., in jamaica ave. brooklyn, new york, while at a buriel of a police officer who was shot with his partner while in the patrol, i was taking pictures of every police officers around the area because they all came from different states and they had different color uniforms and took pictures of the helicopters over flying the area and others and while i was having a late lunch i was reviewing them, i saw one picture with a blue round colored light / object that seemed to be higher than the helicopter that i snap with my cellphone. no other picture came out with it. at the beginning, i thought that it could have been something on the lens of my cellphone. i'm not an expert, so i don't know what to think of it. i just regret not taking more pictures of that same area.
content.summary: Round and blue

content.detailedDescription: I was in my room and spotted a light..I went to loik as it seemed odd..Kinda like a yellowish ball..I watched it change shape and brightness many times and also seemed to drip something free it...It stayed above manchester for 30+ minutes as i watched with clear view and clear skies. ..It definitely was not aeroplane or helicopter . my mrs i observed several ppl in the road who also seemed to be as baffled as i who saw it
content.summary: It hovered motionless for a while then simply dissappeared

content.detailedDescription:
Alright let me start by saying i have witnessed these lights since i was a child, and still continue to. in our house we have a huge picture window i would say 4x4 possibly bigger. i was laying on the couch after i fell asleep there the previous night and i was just staring out the open window trying to get myself awake for the day. saw this light and then thought to myself that's weird its pretty light out why can i still see a star and why can i see a star that low. so i just laid there and stared at it and was trying to think of a reasonable explanation as to why there was a light there in the almost day time.

then it started to move upwards diagonally and went above a tree top. it sat there a second and then fastly moved to the left, then came back to the right and this is when i proceeded to take out my cell phone and try to snap a picture of it the photo is blurry cause i was trying to capture it as it was moving., then proceed to move back down at an angle. just then it disappeared into nowhere like in the snap of a finger. now this is not the first time i have had an incident of a light disappearing out of the sky. theres been times ive waved at the light and it will disappear. it was weird
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Light witness photo included

content.detailedDescription: My mother and i were heading to wayne state university, traveling on i75 southbound. i looked up towards the clouds and thought everything was normal until i could see that something was displacing the light coming from the sun. the area of cloud it covered caused the cloud to appear fuzzy. i pointed this out to my mom, who could now also see it. since this object was cloaked it was hard to see the exact shape, but it appeared to be a classic saucer shape with some kind of "tenticle" (this is in quotes because i really can't tell what this arm like apparatus was). at first i did just assume it was the cloud but at further inspection my mother and i could see that this was some kind of cloaked ufo. it appeared to be still and after 5 solid minutes of observation it took off. given that this object was pretty much invisible, it was impossible to tell whuch direction it was going or how fast it was. obviously we can't just assume this was an extra terrestrial vehicle, but i honestly believe it was and i felt privileged to have personally witnessed some of our galactic brothers/sisters traveling in our skies.
content.summary: {dr|nearly invisible craft hovering in front of cloud, could see visible light displacement, vanished suddenly

content.detailedDescription: Nothing to describe here?
content.summary: Traveling north on gsp cloudy witnnessed a flying object traveling from nne to sww in vertiical / horizontial desent with a slight orange to light blue emission burn seemed to cloes to be a meteor?

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting at my desk and looked at moon. moon was very bright yellow 1/2 full. got very persistent hunch to get camera go outside. when i did i took several photos. posted photos online: facebook (my page), twitter, asking iss what it is? tsu and google +

taken this morning by me. exact time should be on photo or in my camera.
content.summary: Weird stuff in sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was working at the computer for several hours.  finished my job and took a break, looking out the windows at okanagan lake, with moon above, and this very unusual large light beneath it.  the sky was almost cloudless, with a patch of cloud crossing the moon.  the object was in cloudless sky.  the light reflected on the lake was quite bright.  (and it's a very cold night here.)  i noticed the object immediately.  i was aware of no planets that should/could have been in that position, so it seemed odd enough for me to grab the camera.  

it was a large round light, sitting stationary below the moon and well above the horizon.  i watched it for about 1 minute, completely still/hovering, then went to get camera.  i moved out onto the patio off the adjoining room (to south) and began taking pictures.  as soon as i began taking photos, the object began moving rapidly due south.  the speed seemed faster than an commercial jet, but no more than twice as fast.  more like 75% faster.  

the light appeared to become smaller as soon as it began moving, but the size and shape didn't change thereafter as it moved.  it moved due south along the lakeshore above summerland, in the direction of penticton, where there's an airport, then went out of sight.  it did not descend.  

the object appeared round the entire time, but in the last frame photo it looks different -- elongated and with two smaller lights, one on either end.  i had zoomed the camera at that point, too, which probably accounts for the shape change.  

in the first photo the moon looks quite full, but it's not… just ½ half full tonight.  so the camera seems to have made the images look rounder than they were.  

i conclude this was a "ufo" because of the large size and length of time while hovering, then the rapid movement and simultaneous decrease in size.  no airplane, helicopter or satellite could do that, to my knowledge.  

the photo name for ufo 003.Jpg is a different naming convention than the others because i saved a copy, turning it 90 degrees for my viewing.. but i'm sending you the original instead.  the others i re-named so i could view them all together on an .Html page on my desktop.
content.summary: A large round light sat stationary for 1 minute, then began moving across sky and disappeared from view.

content.detailedDescription: Was close and mistaken for a plane (i live near an airport) but it sat for 20 minutes until i realized something wasnt right. i looked back out the window and  i saw it sitting but higher and slightly smaller. woke up my boyfriend and he confirmed i was not crazy, we both watched it erratically shift up anr over, and left then right, then up again. all the while pulsating a red and blue light in what seemed to look like moving in a circle. watched it until it became cloudy and lost sight of it. the size  grew smaller as it flew further away, i'd say i saw it fly low (i mistook it for a plane) until i saw it sitting at 75% smaller than originally seen for 20 minutes, and gradually and erratically flew away until it was out of sight  (cloudy) in 20 minutes.
content.summary: Pulsating object started out large and gradually shifted upwards and smaller. mistaken for plane at first but it sat still for 20 minutes.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside in back yard with my dog.  i first noticed the object simply because i always watch the sky for hawks and aircraft. 
 
it was definately not a blimp. to thin; longer than a boeing 767-300; no lower "navigation basket/viewing" area; extremely long, thin, cigar shape.
no wings; no tail section; no sound and maintained level altitude and moderately slow speed.  headed towards sarnia, ontario but when it went into a white cloud, it did not come out of the other side of the cloud.
it was silver and the sunlight reflected off of it.

i truly believe it was a ufo......Simply because of other past observations i've experienced.

i was tempted to wave, but decided differently because i do not wish to perhaps encourage any problems in the future with them for myself. i just wished that they would be able to help stop all of the wars and chaos in our world and let things be better for us on our planet. i also wondered  where they were from, were they enjoying the scenery as they flew along, and where were they headed?

i lost sight of it when it flew into a small cloud and it did not fly out of the cloud on the other side.  i did not have a camera and have previously experienced (when i lived in sarnia before) that if i could take any pictures, then a day or so later, at least 2 men in black suits come and confiscate the pictures and/or film from me as they did before.
they communicate with aliens and know where to confiscate pics obviously.
content.summary: Extremely long; silver; cigar shape sighted flying above me in a direct path .

content.detailedDescription: On or around june 2010, between 4 and 5 pm, i was in my backyard working in my garden.  my husband, who is now my ex, was outside gathering dead tree limbs.  i don't really know what made me look up in the northern sky, but there it was in broad daylight.  a large triangular shaped object.  it was a very dull silver/black color.  it made no sound and was hovering.  there was no heat or visible lights, or windows.  as i stood there staring at it, my ex asked "what are you looking at a ufo?"   i was afraid of what his reaction would be had i told him the truth, so i said "no".  as i continued to look up it slowly "cloaked" for lack of a better description.  i never saw it move.  i never heard a sound.  but it disappeared from sight as it slowly became invisible.  i was not afraid of what i saw.  i felt very curious.  i wondered if it was something experimental from the us air force as there are several bases close to blanco county texas (i.E. san antonio and killeen).  i have kept quiet about this for 4 years, afraid of what people would think.  most people think you are crazy when you see a ufo, let alone a triangular shape ufo that hovered, made no sound, and then slowly faded from sight without movement.
content.summary: Very dull silver/black triangle hovered for about 5 minutes.  it made no sound.  then it slowly faded or cloaked.  one second it was there then it was gone.

content.detailedDescription:
Military transport plane was traveling from the nne to sse at about 16:30 in west palm beach county.  myself, wife and son looked up at the sky just after exiting a building and saw the military plane with two con-trails followed by a weird looking object for what i believed was a ball with no lights.  all the sudden the object sped up to go as fast as the plane.  at this point i got a better look at it and could tell it was an oval silvery object with absolutely no exhaust.  it then sped off leaving the military plane behind very very quickly. 

i'm a soldier of two enlistment in the army national guard and have seen different types of weaponry being used and never saw anything like this.

my wife tried to dismiss it or didn't want to talk about it.  

we lost sight of the objects due to buildings and trees.

i will provide a sketch asap.
content.summary: Military transport plane was

content.detailedDescription: Taking photographs of beautiful tucson sunset. saw it in the picture when i snapped it. a missile or something else?
content.summary: Accidental observation photographing sunset

content.detailedDescription: My mom and i were driving on the freeway where the 210 meets the 118 in the san fernando valley of los angeles, ca. in the sky we noticed what appeared to be a plane landing (it was dark out, we just saw a white light), but we noticed the object was moving fast. too fast. i didn't think much of it...But then a trail of what looked like flames burst out behind it. my mom and i gasped thinking we were about to witness a plane or asteroid crash land. the flame quickly went out and the object went back to looking like a white/blue circular light. it was then out of our sight.
content.summary: Looked like a plane or an asteroid was about to crash

content.detailedDescription: In mid-january 1983 i was walking over to my friend's house. typically i would walk through the lawn of st. john's lutheran church. as i crossed 5th street sw from main street i happened to glance up. i remember the sky was absolutely clear. and i remember from the northwest something very large, black, and triangular was very slowly passing overhead. i was an avid aircraft model builder and several things struck me as very odd about what i was observing. first, the object appeared to be lower than any aircraft i had previously observed at that location because it seemed to stretch from directly over my head, over the church and to at least the house on the corner of 1st avenue sw and 5th st sw. second, it appeared to be flat, dark black in color and was a solid object. as it passed overhead it blocked out starlight. third, it did not have any aircraft identification lights. i remember seeing a bluish light near my point of view, and a reddish light towards the far side, but no blinking lights or white landing lights that one would expect from a low-flying aircraft. and fourth, as the object slowly passed overhead, it made no noise (which should rule out a helicopter or propeller-powered aircraft) and after it passed overhead there was no sound whatsoever nor was there any visible means of propulsion (i.E. no rocket flame or engine glow). the object continued heading slowly east-southeast over waukon. i've never seen anything like it before or since.
content.summary: Solid black large object moving very slowly and silently from nw to se

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were driving south on i-25 from denver to lone tree, co.  i noticed two circular, large objects at very high altitude.  they appeared to be moving slowly east.  i asked my wife to take photos of the objects, but not through the windshield.  she used her iphone 5s to take several (6-10) photos holding the phone outside of the passenger window facing the phone south.  unfortunately, she deleted most of them after we got home because they were not good shots of the sky (she thought i wanted pictures of the "pretty" clouds).  the one remaining shot did not reveal the orange objects that i saw, but a greenish object in the upper right portion of the photo.
content.summary: 2 large objects glowing orange south of denver

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside 12-28-2014 heard an airplane just west of where i was standing also seen the flashing lights on the plane,  looked slightly east seen a red-orange light with no blinking lights ever, my friend walked up i asked do you see that he said where i pointed out where it was he said yes watched it like 4-6 minutes til out of sight then 2 planes coming from south to north in single formation flew above where i last seen the red-orange solid light and looked to be a round light with no blinking lights what so ever then i noticed i left my phone inside... also years ago i seen a small black triangle with 5 steady burn lights headed from north to south with a steady pace straight south seen this for bout 30 secs til tree line cut off the view i had of it i know this sighting was early morning time and date unknown
content.summary: Outside just after dark seen/heard airplane west of me going south looked east seen an orange in moving at a rapid pace asked a friend if he seen it and continued watching til was gone 2more planes were coming from south to north right where object w

content.detailedDescription: Iwent outside to take aphone call, looked up to the sky, saw what appeared to be2 planets/stars but they were moving, i thought that they might be 2 satellites, but they went from white, to bright yellow that appeared to make them larger, then shrunk and changed to red before completely disappearing. the one in front disappeared first then the second which was flying below and behind.
content.summary: 2 lights flying on formation from south to north changed color before disappearing

content.detailedDescription: From 8:35 p.M. until 8:55 p.M. i witnessed a cluster of multi-colored objects hovering at treetop level and making definite geometric shapes at times interacting with each other. i saw several objects making a huge double triangular shape and others hovering in groups of 3 side by side pulsating and shimmering. these objects were yellowish gold orange red all blended together. i went over and talked to two people standing by their car parked above me and asked them if they were noticing all these multiple lights and if they were enjoying the view as we were way up in the foothills of mt. tamalpais. they said yes they have been seeing a lot of these objects and wondered if they were some kind of drones or something.I told them i just counted 10 objects all at once. then i walked back to where i was standing and a few minutes later counted 14 of these orb like objects. a few minutes later i counted 21 objects- 12 to the left of me and 9 to my right. this was at 8:44 p.M. i could'nt believe it so i counted one more time before i went in and came up with 17. there may have been one more car witness to this as i saw another car leave with the 2 people i talked to.I also saw a cluster of 14 objects on the night of 12-23 as well as a group of 14 objects on the night of 10-29-14. i had binoculars with me during these sightings. virtually all of these objects look identical and make no sound and light up really bright while they are close to the top of hills and at treetop level.
content.summary: Multiple glowing objects seen by 3  people hovering and zig zagging across southeastern  sky

content.detailedDescription: Ok . im now 72 years old and never mentioned this to anyone other than my wife. i was a police officer in takoma park, maryland and was on routine patrol sometime after midnight when i decided to stop and take a smoke break and relax a bit.I pulled over in carl xanders garage which was closed and i had a good view od the area and i stepped out of my car and lit up a smoke. as i did i looked up as something cought my eye.An extremely btight object in the eastern sky that at first i thought was a star. i had never seen one so bright. as i stared at it, it suddenly shot off  to the north at an incredible speed. i got the hell scared out of me. i havent felt that frightened in my life and i was even shaking but i dont know why. i got back in my unit and drove to the police station where i knew there was someone to be around. nothing ever scared me back then being young and a tough cop, but that did.I hung around the station for awhile and the sergeaqnt chased me back out on the patrol but i didnt go back by that area for the rest of my shift.I never mentioned it to anyone for fear of being ostracized.
content.summary: I was a cop on patrol around 2 am and saw bright light in eastern sky that tooki off at unbelievable speed4

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i saw 3 very bright lights south west part of the sky and then they changed like 1 solid oblong mass and the light turned red my husband thought it was a plane at first and so did i but as we kept driving it didn't get closer and it didn't get further away it was still right there. this saw at dusk in the sky was a pale pink in color as the sun was setting the subject was just above the pink of the horizoni. i called my brother who lives in the area and asked him to look to see if he could see anything out his front door he could not i could still observe the light when we got home which was probably a good 10 miles from when we first witness the light and i could still see it in the sky but it was maybe a little bit further away not quite as bright as it was the first time i saw it. when i got in the house i got my tablet out and looked up what was in the sky tonight to see if it may have been a planet or something up there that i could blame this on and there was nothing.
content.summary: Bright lights in the south west going down the highwayv

content.detailedDescription: I saw 3 objects quite high up.They appeared to be stars. they sped south a a high rate of speed. they returned a few minutes later.One descended about 1000 yards away from me. it was above the neighbors land /yard. it projected an odd illuminating beam which swept back and forth as it slowly moved.It began to move closer to me. my walk turned into a run. i called a friend and told her i thought i may be abducted. this thing made no noise and it looked like a tessla coil(electrical sphere) with blue red and green lights flashing alternatively,it made no sound i could hear. i arrived at my residense unmolested (i'm pretty sure). since i've seen these things numerous times with and without others. i kind of figured it is government issue but i've never seen anything like it. i've moved away but they're probably still out there regularly. i didn't report it before for fear of being labeled a kook.
content.summary: Saw these things multiple times. one time i observed an odd illuminating beam projecting thought it looked like it was scanning the ground.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving in a car on rte 222 s. between lancaster and ephrata pa. 10;00 a.M.

didn't notice it till after the picture was taken

when zoomed in, looked like a giant bug with big eyes

only saw the picture, not the actual object

excited.  got to show somebody. curious.

never saw it
content.summary: Took couple pictures of hotair balooons while driving on highway, through front windshield heading south towards lancaster, pa.

content.detailedDescription:
Taking pics from bluff above port washington wisconsin in november. ship looks man made to me. reminded me of the start enterprise shape but as you can see by the pic quite different.
i did not find the ship in th pic until home and reviewing them. blew up this frame and realized this was not anything i had seen ever before. using nikon 7100 with 55-200 lens. i often drive out to locations to take pics.

i sent this to lindo m. howe as well last month.
content.summary: Saucer shape but with appendages below to rear

content.detailedDescription:
From top of radio tower on buffalo mountain facing sw while watching the sunset, possibly johnson city but most likely this is in unincoi (close boarders). took multiple pictures and did not notice until one day later. only two pictures included the "green glow." image 1 shows first location observed which i have enhanced for a closer look; it appears this green glow has a solid base in a shape i am not familiar with (looks like letter t). within one minute (2 pix later)in image 2, this same green glow is closer to us. at first, it appeared it was still in the woods but on a closer hilly mountain. after taking another look, it appears this is in front of the tree line where we parked our cars at the bottom of the tower. if that is that case, then it makes it way harder to determine the size of this object. we were also trying out a new ham radio for fun and made connection with another licensed operator. during the time i was taking pictures, the radio user began to experience some distrubances but only for about 20-30 seconds and then went back to normal; full clarity. we, of course, didn't think anything of it at the time. 

zip file includes: 
image 1: green light from s- sw of sunset
image 2: green light after travelling n (our left to right)
word doc containing enhanced imaging (for fun, i'm sure you have a better process) :) 

i've seen plenty weird things in the sky unaccounted for, but none that glowed green like this... would be wonderful to hear your interpretation if you have time to reach back out to me... would be great to hear a second opinion. 

thanks for the support!
content.summary: Green light not visible to naked eye, only caught in camera

content.detailedDescription:
i cannot at this time remember exact date of the event since it was some time ago. this happened in broad daylight about 2 pm as my wife and i were driving home.  we were on hwy 193 eastbound about 3-5 miles out of lincoln, ca.

   i am quite familiar with most aircraft types since i have always been interested in flight and i spent 3 years in a u.S. navy fighter squadron. this "vehicle" matched nothing a had seen to date. i thought at first it was the stealth fighter never having seen one at the time.  however, this craft was a dull silver metallic like aluminum and was shaped similar to a heart with all rounded contours. it had a small rounded nose like a pencil eraser that extended out from where the point of the heart would have been. it appeared to be made out of one piece of "metal", no seams, no lights, no windows, no vertical stabilizers, no apparent openings or exhaust ports of any kind. it flew from a northerly to southerly direction at approximately 100-120 kts., and 500-1000' elevation over the roadway, dipping it's (right wing) as it passed.  the object was about 1/4 mile or less away from us.  my wife and i both saw it as the same shape, color, and size. i would say that it was about the size of a small airplane with an approximate 30' wing span. it left no vapor trail and i could hear no sound, although i was driving in my vehicle at the time.  after about 3-4 seconds the trees hid my view of the craft and by the time i was clear again it was gone. to this day i have never seen or heard of any craft including the now famous "stealth" jets that resemble what i and my wife saw that day.  another strange fact is that neither i nor my wife mentioned the sighting again for at least a month.  then one day the memory came back to me and i asked her about it.  we discussed the sighting and found that our memories were the same, both the amnesia and the sighting.
content.summary: Dull grey  heart or triangular shaped craft flew from left to right in front of me as i drove my car.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking a photo of the mountains i didn't see this ufo with my own eyes it appeared in the photo.
content.summary: I was taking a picture of the mountains ufo appears in photo

content.detailedDescription:
I was having my first go at astrophotography down herne bay sea front by the pier.

it wasn't till i got home that i noticed the line.

at first i thought it was a hair on the lens  but the photo before & afterwards were clear

basically it was a 4 second shot in raw and jpeg.  the objet didn't move in a striate line like a plane or satellite.   the photo information should be on the raw file

would love to know what it is 

i did not know i even court it on camera to i got home

iv sent the photos before & after the ufo is on 027
content.summary: I was taking photos of the night sky at herne bay seafront.  it was'nt i got home i found it

content.detailedDescription:
My husband at the time and i left a party of athletes and their girlfriends or wife`s. they were drinking the party got too wild for us. another couple asked if they could ride home with us.  the couple said they didn't like the wild party either.  none of us 4 were drinking or smoking pot as the others were.  we left in our car. my husband driving and i in the front seat and the other couple in the back seat.  we were driving toward home on a 4 lane highway.  all of the sudden a the car started being pulled up and dropped over and over again. i thought my husband might be fooling around. i told him to stop doing that and he took his hand off the wheel and said "the car cut off. it's dead." that is when i noted that the car was not on. there was a white light over us  with no noise and it was large hovering and casting a large light over us and on the highway.  we were scared yelling and holding on to each other. the car lifted up and dropped over and over. i was terrified as was everyone else. i don't remember much anything after that, although i think i should remember more.  all i remember after that was the car started up and the light lifted up and over us and disappeared without a sound. it appeared to be a saucer shape. just light up white.
 i was three months or so pregnant at the time with my now 40 year old daughter.
content.summary: Hovered  obove car with 4 people in car pulled car up four feet and let go several ties

content.detailedDescription: I was watching tv, my wife had gone yo bed.  my chair sets where i can see out our front door, facing north. something cought my attention through the door.  i saw what i thought was an aircraft flying east just north of the bypass. but i realised what i saw had a blue light ontop, and i know of no aircraft that has blue navigation lights.  i watched it for about 20 seconds, until i could no longer see it.  i puzzled over this for 2 days before filling this report.
content.summary: Red, white and blue lights seen heading east just north of my home
